slider.title: We ensure your eyes are taken care of

reviews.comment: All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.
All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.
Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).
Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy.

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

bestSellers.title: SCOTT-SC5354
bestSellers.fullDesc: Iksana Opticals Brands cilp on glasses collection. Coloring and lifestyle. Explore your options with Iksana Opticals Brands cilpon glasses Providing SCOTT-SC5354 which is Transparent Blue color, Rectangle shaped, Full Rim optical frame. This eyepiece is carved out of TR90 material which is a skin friendly, hypoallergenic and extremely lightweight material, making the overall frame design light-in-weight. The Transparent Blue colored temples of this eyeglass are on the flatter side initially but blends into a circular shape gradually, providing better grip and comfort to the wearer. The Soctt branding is engraved on the temples for authenticity and quality assurance. This premium, Men,Women  & amp; Unisex spectacle frame is best suited on oval, long, round and triangular face shapes. SCOTT-SC5354 is a part of Eyewear Collection and is made in india. Iksana Opticals provide High quality with Light weight Frames. Power lens you can fit according to your eye power. Free Iksana Opticals Faux Leather case along with cleaning cloth and Warranty Card. Cilp On Glasses. Color yellow. Size: Medium (Eye Width: 51 MM; Nose Bridge: 18 MM; Temple Length: 145 MM

newArrivals.title: READY SWIMMING GOGGLES
newArrivals.fullDesc: 【ANTI-FOG】 Iksana swimming goggles are equipped with fog-coated lenses that have been treated with the latest technology for environmentally friendly anti-fog chemicals. The fogged lenses prevent the goggles from fogging up in the water and offer a wide field of vision with crystal clear results. 【UV PROTECTION】 Iksana swimming goggles protect your eyes from injuries through UV protection and reduce glare from bright light. These mirrored swimming goggles feature polycarbonate lenses that are strong, tear-resistant and provide UV protection to keep out sun damage and reduce the amount of light entering. 【NO LEAK】 Iksana swimming goggles are well sealed. The seal is made of two-layer, soft silicone for extreme comfort and leakage prevention. It can help protect your eyes from chlorine and other pool chemicals, dirt, debris, and bacteria, and prevent irritation and bloodshot eyes. 【Adjustable strap and 3 types of nose bridge】: The head strap of swimming goggles can be adjusted. It could offer a good fit and means the goggles will get bigger. Our swimming goggles fit 3 types of bridge of nose S, M, L, which are suitable for adults over 12 years old. 【Unique design】Iksana Swimming goggles are made of hypoallergenic silicone frames that adapt to the shape of the face. It prevents rubbing for ultimate comfort and reduces the marks around the eyes after swimming. 【Power Range】Iksana Swimming Goggles Lens Ready Power Range Above +6.00 to -10.00. Colour - SOMOKE. Size: 40 MM
newArrivals.tag: Iksana Swimming Goggles, Swimming Goggles, Mirrored Swimming Goggles No leakage, Anti-Fogging, UV Protection, Adjustable Strap, Comfort, Professional Swimming Goggles for Adults, Young People, Swimming Goggles Unisex, Swimming Goggles Female, Swimming Goggles Male, Swimming Goggles Men's, Swimming Goggles Women's, Ready Power Swimming Goggles, Brand Swimming Goggles, Brand Name Nova, Product Type Brand Swimming Goggles, Frame Type full Frame, Frame Shape Oval, Model No.Smoke, Frame Size 40 mm, Frame Width 40 mm, Frame Dimensions 40 mm, Frame colour Smoke, Weight 17gm, Weight Group Light, Frame Material Hypoallergenic Silicone, Prescription Type Sv & Rx, Frame Style Standard, Frame Style Secondary Youth, Collection Light Silicone, Product Warranty 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty, Gender Unisex, Condition New, Bridge of Nose size S, M, L, Age Range Young Adults & kids.
